meanings.definition: A handbook or manual containing essential information
meanings.sent1: I always keep my enchiridia in my backpack for quick reference.
meanings.sent2: The student consulted the enchiridia before the exam to review key concepts.
meanings.sent3: The enchiridia fell open to the page on emergency procedures, making everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an enchiridia of knowledge, ready to be accessed at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The enchiridia was a treasure trove of wisdom, guiding him through life's challenges.

meanings.definition: A collection of short essays or aphorisms
meanings.sent1: The library had a section dedicated to enchiridia filled with insightful writings.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading the enchiridia before bed to ponder its profound messages.
meanings.sent3: The enchiridia of jokes had everyone in stitches at the comedy club.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an enchiridia of thoughts, each one a gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The enchiridia sparkled with wisdom, each aphorism a beacon of light in the darkness.
